name: The Nights at Pippin's
description:
The Nights at Pippin's is a fan game to Scott Cawthon's Five Nights at Freddy's series.

Summary - Should be pretty straight forward, you are a night guard that is working from 12 to 6 am with hostile animatronics. If you survive the night, it will move on to the next night.

If you experience any bugs, comment what you saw and I will try to fix them.
